mapper.select:
SELECT i.api_id, i.api_name, i.api_path, i.api_type, i.api_method, i.auth_type, i.api_status, i.enabled, i.group_id, i.tenant_id, i.remarks, i.version, i.create_by, i.create_time, i.update_by, i.update_time, i.release_time, i.show_sql_script, d.datasource_name FROM base_api_info i left join base_datasource d on i.datasource_id = d.datasource_id
(i.api_name like concat('%',#{apiName},'%') or i.api_path like concat('%',#{apiName},'%'))
and i.api_status =#{devType}
ORDER BY i.api_id desc

SELECT distinct ai.api_id, ai.api_name, ai.api_type FROM base_api_info ai left join base_app_api aa on ai.api_id = aa.api_id WHERE ai.enabled = 1 AND ai.api_status = 'release'
and aa.app_id = #{appId}

SELECT api_id, api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, enabled, group_id, tenant_id, remarks, version, page_setup, show_sql_script, datasource_id, datasource_type, schema_name, sql_script, sql_type, result_type FROM base_api_info WHERE parent_id = 0 AND api_status ='release'
and api_id =#{apiId}

SELECT api_id, api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, enabled, group_id, tenant_id, remarks, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version, datasource_id, datasource_type, schema_name, sql_script, show_sql_script, page_setup, sql_type, result_type FROM base_api_info WHERE api_id =#{apiId}

SELECT b.api_id, b.api_name, b.api_path, b.api_type, b.api_method, b.auth_type, b.api_status, b.sql_type, b.enabled, b.remarks, u.nick_name create_by, b.page_setup, b.create_time, b.sql_script, b.show_sql_script, b.update_time, b.release_time, b.version FROM base_api_info b left join base_sys_user u on b.create_by = u.user_id WHERE b.api_id =#{apiId}
SELECT count(1) FROM base_api_info where api_path =#{apiPath} and api_method =#{method} and api_id !=#{apiId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into base_api_info( api_name, api_path, api_type, api_method, auth_type, api_status, group_id, tenant_id, version, parent_id, remarks, sql_type, result_type, sql_script, show_sql_script, datasource_id, datasource_type, schema_name, page_setup, enabled, create_by, create_time )values( #{apiName}, #{apiPath}, #{apiType}, #{apiMethod}, #{authType}, #{apiStatus}, #{groupId}, #{tenantId}, #{version}, #{parentId}, #{remarks}, #{sqlType}, #{resultType}, #{sqlScript}, #{showSqlScript}, #{datasourceId}, #{datasourceType}, #{schemaName}, #{pageSetup}, #{enabled}, #{createBy}, #{createTime} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM base_api_info where api_status ='edit' and api_id =#{apiId} and create_by =#{userId}
